title: Interpreting a Boxplot
question_text: Consider the following boxplot. Which of the following statements is true?

choices.text: There is at least one data point whose value is $4$.
There are fewer data points between the Median and $Q_1$ then there are between the Median and $Q_3$.
Any value that falls below $3-8(1.5)$ can be considered an outlier.
There are outliers in this data set.
